Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Loomis
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
